data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Neijiang]], Sichuan, China the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Neijiang]], Sichuan, China
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 1,176,112 who are far from you in Neijiang]], Sichuan, China from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.section_summary: On average, 97 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Neijiang]], Sichuan, China.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Neijiang]], Sichuan, China a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the county of Neijiang]] to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Father, help your children in Neijiang]], Sichuan, China find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the county of Neijiang]], Sichuan, China.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.section_summary:
the county of Neijiang]], Sichuan, China has a population of 1,295,300.

We estimate Neijiang]] has 98,263 people who might know Jesus, 20,925 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,176,112 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Neijiang]], Sichuan, China. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.
